actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that the price of unleaded gasoline may not exceed by more than 3 cents per gallon the price for comparable leaded gasoline.

summary.text: Directs the President to prescribe and make effective a regulation prohibiting the sale of a unleaded gasoline at a price in excess of three cents per gallon more than the weighed average price per gallon at which leaded gasoline of the same or nearest octane number is priced.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the price of unleaded gasoline may not exceed by more than 3 cents per gallon the price for comparable leaded gasoline.
